content.text: How would this help our company?

Let's explore that. In which areas of your business do your experts spend significant time accessing and processing company information? Our MCP servers can transform these workflows by connecting their expertise with LLM capabilities and your existing resources. As one of our first 5 pilot customers, you'll help shape how this technology evolves.
We already use ChatGPT in our company.

That's a start, but imagine your experts having an AI that doesn't just chat - it actively connects to your company's resources, understands your domain-specific needs, and enhances your entire production process. As a pilot customer, you'll be among the first to leverage this game-changing capability.
